artist: Engraver: Simon François Ravenet I; Artist: After William Hogarth
description: Frontispiece to Laurence Sterne "The Life and Opinions of Tristam Shandy, Gentleman"; Corporal Trim at right reading a sermon on conscience, facing Dr. Slop at left asleep before fire, and Uncle Toby and Walter Shandy, smoking; Map on wall
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black: Fronispiece Vol 1 / W. Hogarth inv\'t   Vol.2. page 128   S. Ravenet Sculp\'t  | on sheet in pencil: 1-501
title: Print
